title: Prepare for a lucrative career as a certified Python coder for just $20
content:
Macworld

Python coders are in demand. And, according to job websites like Indeed.com, they can earn well over $100K per year on average. Considering a career change? Then you might do well by learning how to code. And since The 2023 Complete Python Certification Bootcamp Bundle is on sale, you can get prepared for way less than normal.

This package offers lifetime access to twelve beginner-friendly courses that introduce students to the basics of Python. They’ll get acquainted with the syntax, learn how the language is applied in AI and other ‘smart’ technologies, and they’ll get their hands dirty as they code their own programs from scratch.

Plus it prepares students to pass the PCEP Certified Entry-Level Python Programmer Certification Exam, which is an important asset for any coder to have — and even for those training for careers in other tech sectors too.

The courses in The 2023 Complete Python Certification Bootcamp Bundle are delivered by some of the web’s top resources such as Mammoth Interactive, Oak Academy, and ZENVA. If you want to become a coder then this bundle is a great way to start. And since it’s on sale, it’s easy to afford.

Save hundreds on The 2023 Complete Python Certification Bootcamp Bundle, discounted to just $19.97 until 11:59 pm on April 23, no coupon codes required.
